title: Elevator access, Subway tile kitchen backsplash, Onsite storage
posting_body: Just 16 miles north of Seattle, located in the picturesque city of Lynnwood, Washington, Tivalli Apartments is the embodiment of sophistication and convenience.

Nestled along the North Puget Sound, our community of studio, one, two and three bedroom apartment homes is meticulously outfitted with high-end contemporary finishes, sleek fixtures, and smart home technology that personify luxury and innovation.
Each detail is carefully considered with you in mind, including the polished granite countertops, stainless steel EnergyStar appliances, in-unit washer and dryer, and large private balconies.
-Fenced dog park with pet watering station
-Kitchen island or breakfast bar with pendent lighting available
-App-controlled smart home automation including smart plug, hub, voice assistant, and leak detector

-Contemporary appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, ice maker, and dishwasher                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity
-Terrace featuring barbecue pavilion and fire pits                                                                                         Featured amenity
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
